newsitem.title: USA: Kansas fed cattle Thursday roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas fed cattle Thursday roundup - USDA.

text.p: DODGE CITY, July 18 (Reuder) - Trade slow. Slaughter
steers and heifers steady. Inquiry good, demand moderate.
Week to date - 92,300 week ago - 92,600 year ago - 35,300
Slaughter steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1100-1300 lbs
64.00; pen 1250 lb Holsteins 57.00. Dressed basis - Select and

Sales confirmed on 3,400 slaughter steers and 3,700 slaughter heifers Thursday. For the week to date 92,300 head confirmed including 24,900 head or about 27 percent previously contracted or formulated cattle. Sales FOB feedlot net weights after 4 percent shrink.
